text: Motion

Listen up, everyone! The concert's not over
until you're all back home, okay?

So make sure you bring back all the fun you've had
with us on your way home! Make it back safe!
We can't wait to see your faces again!
Motion
(Always smiling on stage─)
Motion

Good to see you, Yamaguchi-san!
Your nails are on point again today! So cute!

!!! YES! I finally did it! I kept doing this hoping that
you'd notice, Mitsumine-chan! I'm glad it worked!
Aha, that badly, huh~?

But really, your nails are extra cute each day!
I've always looked forward to seeing them!
Motion
Motion

──Oh, good morning, Hayakawa-san!
Let's have another good one today!

(She remembers the names of staff members and
co-stars... not to mention even the smallest details──)
Motion
Fan
Y-You're Mitsumine-chan aren't you...!

Uh-oh! Looks like someone caught me...!
That's right! It's me, Mitsumine-chan!
Um, so uh... I-Is it okay if we shake hands...?

Why of course~!
I'm so glad you came up and asked!
──And please do keep rooting for me♡
I-I will...!

(Even when suddenly approached by a fan, she
doesn't hesitate to shake hands and give fanservice...)
Motion

(She's an exemplary idol with barely any need of
direction. However...)

Waaaa, P-taaaan...
Help me, I can't fill this survey out~
What are you stuck on?

"Actions from a man that make your heart skip
a beat"
So what do you think? Care to demonstrate♡
...Huhhhh? Why should I have to do that for?

Because this outside the realm of Mitsumine's expertise.
So you should show me what this is all about, P-tan~
...Think hard on what you're asking of me, Yuika.

If you put me on the spot like that, there's no way I
can pull it off. So why should embarrass myself like that?
Huh? Not even for your deal idol?
This is not part of my job description...!

Besides, isn't there a chance you can pull it off?
And get Mitsumine's heart skipping a beat too~?
You're not getting me to do that.
Awww, well there goes my self-confidence~

Well whatever. I think I'll write, "even if it isn't in part
of the job, I'd still like for him to play along with me."
Eh?

Thanks for helping me fill it out, P-tan. Did you happen
to feel a little something towards the end at least?
Yes. Embarrassment...!
Ahahaha!

(──when it's just us, I find myself on the other end
of her teasing. That being said...)

(You can say that it's evidence that I'm doing
well as her producer...)

(Haha....
Just what do you have in store for me, Yuika───)
